name: Origin as Source
conclusion: The origin is a source for the linear system of differential equations given by $\dot{x} = x$ and $\dot{y} = y$

missing.statement: Show that the eigenvalues of the matrix  $\begin{bmatrix} 1 & 0 \\ 0 & 1 \end{bmatrix}$ are both positive.  Connect this result to the definition of a source for a system of linear differential equations.
